description: Yuu, wanting to try out her powers, transforms and heads to Shinjuku to play. At the same time, Parthenon Production`s boss Tachibana Shingo is at his wits` end because the singer who is supposed to be appearing on his show, Ayase Megumi, is late. With no time to spare before filming, Tachibana pulls Yuu on stage to perform. She tells everyone her name is Creamy Mami, then disappears after the performance using magic.
